text: Hansruedi Scheller (4 April 1931 - 15 October 2007) was a Swiss rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's eight where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. He also participated in orienteering and won seven national titles (four as an individual and three with teams). ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Swiss male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Switzerland Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from St. Gallen (city) Category:Swiss orienteers Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Hansruedi Scheller
